SELECT USER_ID FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT USER_ID FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND USER_PW = #{userPw}
SELECT COUNT(USER_ID) FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND USER_PW = #{userPw}

SELECT CODE_ID , CODE_NAME , CODE_TYPE , BOARD_TYPE , BOARD_NUM , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_COMMENT , TOTAL_CNT , BOARD_HITS , CREATE_TIME , BOARD_REF , BOARD_LEV , BOARD_STEP FROM ( SELECT CODE_ID , CODE_NAME , CODE_TYPE , BOARD_TYPE , BOARD_NUM , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_COMMENT , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BOARD_NUM DESC) AS NUMROW , COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTAL_CNT , BOARD_HITS , BOARD.CREATE_TIME , BOARD_REF , BOARD_LEV , BOARD_STEP FROM BOARD JOIN COM_CODE ON BOARD.BOARD_TYPE=COM_CODE.CODE_ID ORDER BY BOARD_REF DESC, BOARD_STEP ASC ) WHERE NUMROW BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM BOARD

SELECT CODE_ID ,CODE_NAME ,BOARD_TYPE ,BOARD_NUM ,BOARD_TITLE ,BOARD_COMMENT ,BOARD_REF ,BOARD_LEV ,BOARD_STEP FROM BOARD JOIN COM_CODE ON BOARD.BOARD_TYPE=COM_CODE.CODE_ID WHERE BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType} AND BOARD_NUM = #{boardNum}

INSERT INTO BOARD (BOARD_TYPE , BOARD_NUM , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_COMMENT , CREATOR , CREATE_TIME , MODIFIER , MODIFIED_TIME , BOARD_HITS , BOARD_REF , BOARD_STEP , BOARD_LEV ) VALUES (#{boardType} , (SELECT NVL(TO_NUMBER(MAX(BOARD_NUM)+1),1) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType}) , #{boardTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{boardComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , 'SYSTEM' , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-HH-DD HH24:MI') , 'SYSTEM' , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE) , '0' ,(SELECT NVL(TO_NUMBER(MAX(BOARD_REF)+1),1) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType}) , '0' , '0' )
SELECT CODE_ID ,CODE_NAME ,CODE_TYPE FROM ( SELECT CODE_ID ,CODE_NAME ,CODE_TYPE FROM COM_CODE )
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_HITS = BOARD_HITS+1 WHERE BOARD_NUM = #{boardNum} AND BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (BOARD_TYPE , BOARD_NUM , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_COMMENT , CREATOR , CREATE_TIME , MODIFIER , MODIFIED_TIME , BOARD_HITS , BOARD_REF , BOARD_STEP , BOARD_LEV ) VALUES ( #{boardType} , (SELECT NVL(TO_NUMBER(MAX(BOARD_NUM)+1),1) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType}) , #{boardTitle} , #{boardComment} , 'SYSTEM' , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-HH-DD HH24:MI') , 'SYSTEM' , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE) , '0' , #{boardRef} , #{boardStep} + 1 , #{boardLev} + 1 )
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_STEP = BOARD_STEP + 1 WHERE BOARD_REF = #{boardRef} AND BOARD_STEP > #{boardStep}
